project_metadata.description: A comprehensive domain model for an e-commerce platform, integrating core business functions like customer management, order fulfillment, inventory control, and payment processing. This model synthesizes individual bounded context analyses into a cohesive, non-redundant structure.

bounded_contexts.description: Manages all aspects of customer data, including profiles, addresses, wishlists, and registered payment methods. This context is the authoritative source for customer-specific information.

entities.name: Customer
entities.description: Represents a registered user of the platform, encapsulating their personal details, communication preferences, and associated shopping lists and payment instruments. It acts as an aggregate root.

entities.name: Wishlist
entities.description: A collection of desired products maintained by a customer, identified by their SKUs. This entity is owned by the Customer aggregate.

entities.name: PaymentMethod
entities.description: Stores the details of a customer's registered payment instrument, such as credit card tokenization or bank account details. This entity is owned by the Customer aggregate.

value_objects.name: Address
value_objects.description: A value object representing a physical mailing or shipping address.

value_objects.name: EmailAddress
value_objects.description: A value object representing a unique email address for communication.

value_objects.name: ProfileInformation
value_objects.description: A value object containing personal contact information for a customer.

bounded_contexts.description: Handles the lifecycle of customer orders, from initial creation and item selection through to fulfillment and delivery. It coordinates with other contexts for customer details, product availability, and payment.

entities.name: Order
entities.description: Represents a customer's request for products, tracking its status through the fulfillment process. It is the aggregate root for order-related operations.

entities.name: OrderItem
entities.description: A line item within an Order, detailing a specific product SKU, quantity, and unit price at the time of purchase. This entity is owned by the Order aggregate.

value_objects.name: OrderStatus
value_objects.description: A value object representing the current state of an order (e.g., Pending, Confirmed, Shipped, Delivered, Cancelled).

bounded_contexts.description: Manages the product catalog and stock levels, ensuring accurate inventory records and availability for sales. It acts as the authoritative source for product information.

entities.name: Product
entities.description: Represents a distinct item available for sale, including its details, pricing, and current stock levels. It acts as an aggregate root.

entities.name: Category
entities.description: A classification for organizing products within the catalog. It acts as an aggregate root.

value_objects.name: StockLevel
value_objects.description: A value object encapsulating the various quantities related to a product's stock, including what's available, reserved, and the threshold for reordering.

bounded_contexts.description: Handles financial transactions, ensuring secure and accurate processing of payments and refunds for orders. It integrates with external payment gateways.

entities.name: Payment
entities.description: Represents a financial transaction associated with an order, tracking its progress and final status. It acts as an aggregate root.

value_objects.name: Money
value_objects.description: A value object representing a monetary amount with its associated currency. Used for prices, order totals, and payment amounts across contexts.

value_objects.name: PaymentStatus
value_objects.description: A value object representing the current state of a payment (e.g., Pending, Authorized, Completed, Failed, Refunded).
